    • Method Detail

      • loadImageFile

        public static Image loadImageFile(java.lang.String imageFile,
                                  boolean mipmap,
                                  int filtering,
                                  boolean asResource)
        Load image file from ressources and store into Image object
        Parameters:
        imageFile - Path to image relative to application
        mipmap - Uses this image mipmapping/anisotropic filtering (if supported)
        filtering - Wich filtering mathod (GL_NEARES, GL_LINEAR, ...)
        asResource - Loading image from resources
        Returns:
        Image object

      • loadImageFileGl

        public static int loadImageFileGl(java.lang.String imageFile,
                                  boolean mipmap,
                                  int filtering,
                                  boolean asResource)
        Loading a image file into an opengl texture. Returning 0, if image could not be load
        Parameters:
        imageFile - Path to image relative to application
        mipmap - Uses this image mipmapping/anisotropic filtering (if supported)
        filtering - Wich filtering mathod (GL_NEARES, GL_LINEAR, ...)
        asResource - Loading image from resources
        Returns:
        Opengl texture with image data

      • loadCubeMap

        public static int loadCubeMap(java.lang.String path,
                              java.lang.String ext,
                              boolean asResource)
        Loading cube map texture from abstract path and extension. The cube map file names will be generated by:
        path + ['_lf', '_rt', '_up', '_dn', '_ft', '_bk'] + '.' + ext
        Parameters:
        path - Abstract path to the cubemap
        ext - Extension of the cube map images
        asResource - Loading cube map images from resources
        Returns:
        Cube map texture id

      • loadCubeMap

        public static int loadCubeMap(java.lang.String left,
                              java.lang.String right,
                              java.lang.String top,
                              java.lang.String bottom,
                              java.lang.String front,
                              java.lang.String back,
                              boolean asResource)
        Loadig cubemap texture from 6 texture files
        Parameters:
        left - Left sube map texture
        right - Right sube map texture
        top - Top sube map texture
        bottom - Bottom sube map texture
        front - Front sube map texture
        back - Back sube map texture
        asResource - Loading cube map images from resources
        Returns:
        Loaded cube map texture id
